tool_description: Facilitates running A/B experiments. Simple, fast, and reliable.
name: abEx
title: abEx

api_list.name: /v1/status
api_list.description: Gets various information about an experiment, including allocation counts if available

required_parameters.name: experimentId
required_parameters.description: ID of the experiment, provided during creation using /create endpoint

api_list.name: /healthcheck
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://abex1.p.rapidapi.com/healthcheck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "abex1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://abex1.p.rapidapi.com/healthcheck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "abex1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
